statements: SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT id, location FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT location FROM transaction_metadata WHERE device_used = 'Computer';
SELECT id, location, device_used FROM transaction_metadata WHERE id = 3;
SELECT device_used, id, location FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY device_used ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY id DESC, location
SELECT id, location FROM transaction_metadata WHERE device_used = 'Mobile'
SELECT id, device_used FROM transaction_metadata WHERE location LIKE '%Store%'
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata WHERE device_used IN ('PC', 'Tablet') ORDER BY location
SELECT location, device_used FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY device_used ASC, location DESC
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT transaction_id, location_info FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT device_used, transaction_id FROM transaction_metadata WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT detection_id, fraud_score, detection_time FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata JOIN fraud_detection ON transaction_metadata.transaction_id = fraud_detection.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transaction_metadata;
SELECT device_used, location_info FROM transaction_metadata ORDER BY device_used DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, location_info->>'city' AS city FROM transaction_metadata WHERE location_info->>'country'='USA' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT detection_id, transaction_id, fraud_score, detection_time FROM fraud_detection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8 AND detection_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY detection_time DESC;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.device_used, f.fraud_score FROM transaction_metadata t JOIN fraud_detection f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT location, device_id FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM locations WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE location LIKE '%office%' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE location = 'New York' AND device_id = 101;
SELECT transaction_id, location, device_id FROM transactions WHERE device_id IN (100, 102) ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE location = 'London' AND device_id = 102 AND location IN (SELECT city FROM locations WHERE country = 'UK');
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.location, d.device_name FROM transactions t JOIN devices d ON t.device_id = d.device_id WHERE d.device_type = 'Laptop';
SELECT * FROM TransactionMetadata;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM TransactionMetadata WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM DeviceInformation;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationInformation WHERE location_id = 50;
SELECT transaction_id, location_id, device_id FROM FraudDetection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM TransactionMetadata WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT location, device_id, timestamp FROM TransactionMetadata WHERE device_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM LocationInformation WHERE country = 'USA' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT device_name, device_type, device_os FROM DeviceInformation WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' OR device_type = 'Tablet';
SELECT transaction_id, location_id, device_id, fraud_score FROM FraudDetection WHERE fraud_score > 0.8 ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, country, city FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT device_name, device_type, os_version FROM devices WHERE device_type='Mobile' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, risk_score, fraudulent FROM fraud_detection WHERE risk_score > 80 AND fraudulent=true;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE location_id = 5;
SELECT location_name, city, country FROM locations WHERE postal_code = '12345' AND city = 'New York';
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM devices WHERE os_version = 'Windows 10';

SELECT transaction_id, amount, location_name, city, device_name FROM transactions INNER JOIN locations ON transactions.location_id = locations.location_id INNER JOIN devices ON transactions.device_id = devices.device_id;
